title: Who is the best player for Fortnite?
self_text: I'm just asking who you guys think is the best in the game, and why? It doesn't have to be a pro or someone super popular, just whoever you think has the most skill.  There are so many great players that deserve some recognition, but there are a few standouts that always seem to come out on top.  I'll list a few of my thoughts below:  1. Ninja - He has insane mechanical skills and an incredible understanding of the game.  2. Clix - Has amazing building skills and strategic thinking.  3. Bugha - The guy has a crazy amount of raw mechanical talent.  4. Epikc - A solid player with good mechanics and game sense.  5. Mongra - Arguably the best at the moment in terms of map control and creative strategies.  I'd love to hear what other players you guys think are deserving of being listed here!  Do you think anyone should be added to the list?

title: I was going to ask for help with the next chapter but realized that it might be too long and hard for people, so I'm posting here instead.
self_text: It all started when I got my first job at a small pizza place called Tony’s Pizza in 2017. At first I thought it was gonna be fun getting paid to make pizzas and hanging out with friends, but I quickly realized there were some problems. The owner of the store, Tony, was a total jerk who treated everyone like they were disposable. He would yell at us for things as simple as forgetting to put oregano on a pizza or messing up a topping order. Every single time we messed up, he would call us into his office and yell at us until we cried. There was only one other employee named Sarah who didn’t get yelled at much, because she was the manager and the owner’s daughter. I tried talking to her about it, but she just shrugged and said “Just deal with him.”  I tried to ignore it, thinking it would eventually go away, but it never did. I hated working at that place. But it was all I could afford back then, so I kept showing up every day. One day, I was taking orders from a guy named Marcus. I don’t know why, but he seemed really nice. He ordered a large pepperoni pizza, extra cheese, and asked if I could add mushrooms too. So I added them and handed him the pizza. When he took a bite, he immediately spit it out and yelled, “This is disgusting! You put the wrong kind of mushrooms!”  I went running into the kitchen where Tony was yelling at Sarah, “You can’t even do your job right!”  I was crying, and Tony looked at me and said, “Well, you screwed up too.” Then he told me to quit.   I quit immediately. And now, years later, I still have nightmares about that job. I haven't been able to sleep well ever since. But something weird happened after I quit. I woke up the next morning feeling refreshed. Like I was reborn. I felt happy. I had no idea why, so I decided to go outside and see what was happening. As soon as I stepped onto the sidewalk, I saw an old man walking down the street. He looked exactly like Tony. Except…he wasn’t wearing his usual greasy apron. Instead, he was wearing a beautiful white robe and carrying a staff made of gold. He smiled at me and said, “Hello, my son.”   I froze. I couldn’t speak. He continued, “Don’t worry, I won’t hurt you. I’ve been watching you for a long time, and I know how much you suffered. You deserve peace.” Then he raised his staff and pointed it at me. A bright light flashed, and I suddenly found myself standing in a beautiful garden filled with flowers and trees. Everything smelled amazing. Birds were singing, and butterflies were fluttering around.   “Welcome,” the old man said, “to paradise.”   I looked around in amazement. This place was unlike anything I had ever seen. It was perfect.  But as I walked further into the garden, I noticed something strange. There were others there too. People who looked like they had died horrible deaths. Some were screaming, some were crying, some were just staring blankly ahead.  And they all looked... unhappy.   Then I realized what the old man had done. He hadn’t brought me to paradise. He had brought me to hell.

title: How long does it take to get the gold sword in The Witcher 3?
self_text: For those who are wondering how long it takes to get the gold sword I've put together a timeline of all the steps involved with the estimated time each step takes.  1) Get your first sword - about 2-5 hours, depending on your level and where you are in the game. 2) Get a horse (about 4 hours). 3) Reach Kaer Morhen - about 8-16 hours depending on your starting point and if you go through side quests along the way. 4) Complete the tutorial/first quest at Kaer Morhen - about an hour. 5) Finish the main story for around 70-90 hours. 6) Find and complete the hunt for the Silver Wolf, which is the hardest quest in the game. This can take anywhere from 20-80 hours depending on your skill. Once that's done you can finally get your gold sword by doing a few quests for the Order of the Griffin in Velen. Overall estimate is around 130-200 hours or more.

self_text: I've been playing through the Witcher 3 for about a year now and I have completed all side quests, collected all crowns, and beaten all the main and side bosses. I'm on blood and wine chapter now and I'm finding it hard to be excited to play again. I want to start a new game but I don't want to lose all my progress and characters I created. Am I better off starting a new game or just continuing with my current playthrough?

title: Should I play the single player or multiplayer mode?
self_text: Am still pretty new to the game and don’t know if I should play multiplayer or single player first. Would like some advice on what to do first so I can get into it better.

title: New to the game, should I buy a console or pc?
self_text: If I wanted to play with friends who are on PC, would I be able to play them in the same lobbies? Or is it best to just stick to my own console/pc?

title: I don't know why but my game keeps crashing when I start a new chapter
self_text: It's happening to me every time I try to play the first chapter, and it always happens at the same place in the game. Anyone else having this issue?

title: Is it possible to get the sword of truth in kingdom hearts 3?
self_text: I was wondering if it’s possible to get the sword of truth in kingdom hearts 3, and if so how. I have been playing for a while now and haven’t gotten it yet. Also what are some other cool weapons or items that are hard to obtain?

title: Is there a way to get the sword of truth?
self_text: I have been trying for weeks now and still can't find it!  I even went through all the quest lines again, but I am unable to get the sword. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

title: I'm so sorry for the late reply but can someone tell me what's the current status of the official DLC for The Witcher 3?

title: I am struggling to beat the final boss of chapter 3.
